item.title: European leaders back 'realistic' Arab plan for Gaza
item.description: The foreign ministers of France, Germany, Italy and Britain welcomed the plan, which calls for Gaza to be rebuilt over five years.

item.title: South Korea's impeached president Yoon released from detention
item.description: Yoon Suk Yeol still faces trial on insurrection charges for his failed attempt to impose martial law.

item.title: Body found in floodwaters and troops injured in Australia storm
item.description: At least one man has died in floodwaters and military personnel have been injured in the wild weather.

item.title: Twelve injured in shooting at Toronto pub
item.description: The three male suspects entered the pub and opened fire "indiscriminately" police say.

item.title: Vital leprosy drugs due in Nigeria after year delay
item.description: Newly diagnosed patients may have suffered irreversible damage as a result of not having the drugs.
